storyInfo: El Capitán sends his men to the community under the guise of a fire inspection. Its residents escape under cover, but the prep work on the arts festival meets a destructive end.

attributes.content: Tecno, Papá, there are soldiers putting up barbed wire downstairs.
attributes.name: Community Guard

attributes.content: Soldiers? What are they doing here?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: They showed us warrants. They say they're here to investigate fire hazards.
attributes.name: Community Guard

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Uh... Is that something the military handles? Isn't this a job for those dumb civil servants?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Tecno, take the elderly and children away from here. Go to the Rhodes Island office and get Ernesto.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Everyone else, come with me, and bring weapons. Don't count on getting a good night's sleep.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: I-I'm staying!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: You have the best Arts of us all. You're the only one I can trust to get them out of here.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Tecno, I'm giving you an important mission. Protect them, at all costs.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Okay... Papá.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: May I ask your purpose here?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Diaz González, I remember you. You came to Dossoles and became a firefighter after you left the Singas army.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: You fought fires for five years, putting yourself in danger countless times, and earning just as many commendations.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: How did you fall so far as to end up in this stinking place?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: I'm a firefighter. It doesn't matter where I am. I'm always fighting fires. A fire in a luxury hotel is still a fire, and so is a fire in a back alley.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: If there's a fire, I can and will fight it.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Hah... The way I see it, you're one of us, Diaz. I'm sure you'll cooperate, right?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Enough. I know what it is you're scheming. You call this a fire safety inspection, but you're just trying to chase us away.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: This is all in the interest of safety. You don't want a repeat of that disaster a couple years ago, do you?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Get out of here. I have things under control. You don't get to tell us what to do.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Oh, that simply won't do, Diaz. This puppet show has drawn the eyes of the entire city. What happens here is about more than just you now.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: We'll make sure that your show doesn't have an adverse effect on the public at large.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: I told you to get lost!
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Oh, you don't get it, do you? We're here to conduct an inspection. We came prepared.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Alright boys, make sure you check every last one of them. Don't let any potential danger slip through your fingers.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Anyone who gets in the way of our inspection is endangering public safety. Show them no mercy.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Officer's Subordinate

attributes.content: Coño... These thugs.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Tecno, I'm scared... Where are we going?
attributes.name: Small Child

attributes.content: Some bad guys forced their way into our neighborhood. It's not safe here. I'm taking you to Ernesto.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: What about the others...? Are we just going to leave them here?
attributes.name: Elderly Woman

attributes.content: Papá told me to look after you... He said... he'd stay and take care of the rest.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: They're coming this way. We need to hurry.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: What's this about?!
attributes.name: Community Electrician

attributes.content: Inspect all of the puppets' power lines. If you find anything risky, tear them all out.
attributes.name: Irate Soldier

attributes.content: Hey, it took me forever to put all this together. Leave those alone!
attributes.name: Community Electrician

attributes.content: Out of the way, public nuisance.
attributes.name: Irate Soldier

attributes.content: Come on, man. Don't do this. Be reasonable. You're looking at half a year's worth of blood, sweat, and tears... Don't ruin it. Please, don't...
attributes.name: Community Electrician

attributes.content: Like I give a shit how many months you put into this. I should lock you up right now for this flagrant violation of electrical safety.
attributes.name: Irate Soldier

attributes.content: Stop—!
attributes.name: Community Electrician

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Community Electrician

attributes.content: Conchetumare, enough with the wailing.
attributes.name: Officer's Subordinate

attributes.content: *whimper*... Don't!
attributes.name: Community Electrician

attributes.content: What the hell is this place? Some kind of hideout? Didn't expect it to be this clean.
attributes.name: Harsh Officer

attributes.content: Sir, the puppets are right outside the window. Open them up and you'll see.
attributes.name: Officer's Subordinate

attributes.content: Take a look, see how much foam and wood they stuffed in them? What if they were to catch fire?
attributes.name: Harsh Officer

attributes.content: Tear them apart!
attributes.name: Harsh Officer

attributes.content: Thugs, all of you! You should rot in hell!
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: Ugh... What a bunch of beasts... So thoughtless...
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: Boss!
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: What are you people doing?! Didn't I tell you to round them up and bring them to the field? Get the lead out!
attributes.name: Harsh Officer

attributes.content: His people are putting up a struggle. It's been difficult to get them under control.
attributes.name: Officer's Subordinate

attributes.content: Then follow my lead and start cracking skulls, you idiot!
attributes.name: Harsh Officer

attributes.content: See? Look how calm he is now.
attributes.name: Harsh Officer

attributes.content: Bastards... You bastards...
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: Now get them out of here. Those puppets are huge, it's gonna be plenty of work taking them apart.
attributes.name: Harsh Officer

attributes.content: We're almost out. They probably wouldn't expect us to come this way...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Abuela, watch your step, the ground is slippery. Let me help you.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Elderly Woman

attributes.content: Tecno, will we ever come back?
attributes.name: Small Child

attributes.content: Of course. This is our home.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: But those men tore everything down... If we come back, we'll have to spend so much time to get everything back to how it was.
attributes.name: Small Child

attributes.content: They'll pay for that. I swear...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: When we get back, I'll help you put everything right. I promise...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Quickly now. It's still a long walk to the office.
attributes.name: Elderly Woman

attributes.content: Abuelita, I'll help you.
attributes.name: Small Child

attributes.content: Stay close, everyone.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Everyone

attributes.content: Tecno? Ellie? Come in, hurry! What are you guys doing here?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Where's Ernesto? I need his help.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: He said he had something personal to take care of and went off on his own. He's still not back.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Ela and I are the only ones here now. What's going on?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Coalition forces have surrounded the neighborhood. They're tearing down our puppet show under the guise of a fire inspection... Papá told me to bring everyone here to lay low.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Tecno... What's the situation over there now?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I... I don't know. On the way here, all I could hear was the sounds of them breaking everything... A lot of people were crying, and I don't know if they were hurt or not...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Those thugs...!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I... I need to go back. I'm worried about Papá. He was acting brave, telling me to leave and let him deal with the soldiers...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: But... he's not nearly as strong as he used to be... He's old now, even if his tongue is as sharp as ever.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I have to go, Ela.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Don't cry, Tecno. We'll go with you.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: We will help you.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Doc here will stay and take care of the elderly and the children. Don't worry about them.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Ela, Tecno's people here are all fine. They don't need me.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: It's the ones in that neighborhood who need my help. I'll go with you.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: These vents are way too long.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I'm covered in dust. *cough*.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: How is it, Doc? Can you get down?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I have pretty broad hips... I think I'm stuck.
attributes.name: Doc
Tecno
attributes.content: Give me your hand. I'll pull you out.

attributes.name: Tecno
attributes.content: Oof—!
attributes.joined: Give me your hand. I'll pull you out. Oof—!

attributes.content: The vents may be great for you guys to crawl around, but I have a hard time just squeezing myself into them.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: They have the place completely surrounded, and they're covering the way we came out, too. The vents are our only path.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Fuze, give me a sitrep.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: It's more complicated than we thought. They have a large number of troops standing guard outside the neighborhood. I had to break off, but the explosives are in place.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Ready to detonate.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: How is it looking outside the window?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: There are way more men than I anticipated... They took everyone outside.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Is anyone hurt?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Then, is anyone...?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: No. Don't worry. They're alive.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Phew... That's good to hear.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Ela, there are snipers on the roof. We need to take care of them first.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Doc, you and Tecno stay here. Wait for our signal before you act.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: What are you looking for, Tecno?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: The storage device. All our design documents are stored on it. They destroyed our puppets, but as long as we still have that, we can rebuild them someday.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I'll help you look for it.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Well, I thought I was just up here for a smoke. I didn't expect to run into a few sneaky musbeasts.
attributes.name: Slacking Officer

attributes.content: I'll deal with him. Go get the storage device. It's in the top shelf of that cabinet.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Señorita, maybe you should let your friend take me on instead. A little girl like you can't land a finger on me!
attributes.name: Slacking Officer

attributes.content: Oh yeah?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: *sigh*... You shouldn't have taunted her...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Didn't your mother ever teach you not to look down on people?! Time to teach you a lesson!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Agh! My leg!
attributes.name: Slacking Officer

attributes.content: Little girl? I'm a little girl because I'm short?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: My nose!
attributes.name: Slacking Officer

attributes.content: Little girl? Vete a la chingada!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Ugh—
attributes.name: Slacking Officer

attributes.content: Dealt with him. Did you find the storage device?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Bad news. There's nothing on the top of the cabinet. Someone took the device.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Who... Who could've taken it?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: You can stop glaring at me, Señor Diaz. I asked you to cooperate with us. You only have yourselves to blame for all these wounded.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Pfft. You can drop the act. Who are you trying to fool?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Hold him down!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Oof... fearsome fellow. If I didn't have my men here, you might've actually cut me down.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: I'm afraid I have some bad news. Our inspection turned up a lot of serious hazards. Especially those puppets.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Once activated, they could have a serious adverse effect on the whole neighborhood's energy supply, maybe even the surrounding neighborhoods.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: That's why I gathered all of you here, to give you a warning.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Who... sent you?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: There are plenty who think fondly of this place... and just as many who want to get rid of us...
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: But all they ever do is come at us... They don't spare a thought to what we do.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Once you're there, your top priority is to destroy those puppets. And do it in full view of everyone.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Cut off water and electricity, drive them out of the place... That comes later. For now, we provoke them, anger them, and then...
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Draw the fires of their fury where they must burn.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I'll be waiting there for good news.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Except him...
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Except that man...
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Do you really have to ask, if you've already figured it out?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Is this all of them?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Do it.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: The moment the officer gives the order, the soldiers standing by swarm in. The puppets' bodies are rapidly torn apart, their materials and internal wiring scattered all across the ground, until only their heads lean against each other.
Their once swift pupils fall from their eye sockets, exposing the torn wiring inside.
There is a deafening silence among the assembled crowd. Many choose to look away, unable to bear witness to this atrocity.
Only Diaz looks on without so much as a blink. His eyes are filled with fury.
Oh, right, I found this... storage device on one of your shelves. I had a man check it for me. Your design documents are all in here, along with a bunch of other things.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: You've destroyed enough already. Won't you spare us this?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: We have to eradicate all threats, Señor Diaz.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: An almost inaudible weeping can be heard in the silent crowd. Even a man as headstrong as Diaz is unable to keep his eyes stony.
Give that to me, you thug!
Who's there?!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Out of the way!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Coño. She snatched it.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: What are you idiots doing? Who let this punk in here? Seize her!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Stop resisting, and hand that over!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Let go of me!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Trying to use Arts?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Hand it over!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Pft, in your dreams.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: You dare kick me?!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: The officer, after getting a kick in the face from Tecno, angrily shoves her to the ground and attempts to snatch the device back, but the Durin keeps a tight grip on it throughout the whole ordeal.
After multiple fruitless attempts, the officer gives up. He stands up, expressionless, and stomps violently onto Tecno's tightly clenched fist.
Again and again, until his sole is dyed solid crimson.
Still won't let go, huh?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: I... I won't... Take it from me... If you can...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: The moment he lifts his knee again, a red beam shines from the roof of a building up above, with a small red dot landing on his forehead.
Try stomping her again.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: If you want to know what it feels like to have three bullets enter your body at the same time, go ahead.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: What... took you so long?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I'd die if I leapt from the fourth floor of a building.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Hrmph.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Take your men with you, sir, all of them. Or you'll have more than bullets waving hello.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Fine, we completed our objectives... No reason to waste any more time with you.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Notify all units. We're pulling out.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer
